name: Loader
responsibilities: Reads data from a file and presents it in "rows" where each row represents a single entity. These are presented as maps from attribute names to values.
+ readRow(), reads the next row from the source
+ resetReader(), makes this loader read from the beginning of source data again.

name: Row
responsibilities: Represents a single entity in raw data form.
+ type(), returns a string representing the type of entity this row holds
+ empty(), returns whether this row contains data
+ get(String), returns the value associated with the given attribute, null if the attribute does not exist
